io.spine.server.bus

Interface EnvelopeValidator<E extends MessageEnvelope<?,?,?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of the MessageEnvelope to validate

    public interface EnvelopeValidator<E extends MessageEnvelope<?,?,?>>
    An interface defining the validator for a MessageEnvelope.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional validate(E envelope)
      Validates the given MessageEnvelope by some specific rules.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        java.util.Optional validate(E envelope)
        Validates the given MessageEnvelope by some specific rules.
        Parameters:
        envelope - the envelope to validate
        Returns:
        Optional.empty() if the envelope passes the validation or the cause of the validation error
        See Also:
        for the detailed description of the returned value
